components.name: pkg-fluxos-agent

notes.summary: Stabilize inbox task tool orchestration: wait/poll behavior, get_task_status fallback wiring, and task observe streaming fix.
Rename agent package folder and distribution from flux-agent to fluxos-agent while keeping flux_agent import path stable.
Update Tentacle local package references and production image builds to use packages/fluxos-agent.
